entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blizzard developing this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near noon then snow and blowing snow. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 late in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023
